definitions.definition: Any of the hereditary social classes and subclasses of South Asian societies or similar found historically in other cultures.
A separate and fixed order or class of persons in society who chiefly associate with each other.
The division of society into castes; the caste system .
A class of polymorphous eusocial insects of a particular size and function within a colony .
examples: In beehives , most bees belong to the worker caste .

main_definition: Any of the hereditary social classes and subclasses of South Asian societies or similar found historically in other cultures.
secondary_definitions: A separate and fixed order or class of persons in society who chiefly associate with each other.
( uncountable ) The division of society into castes; the caste system .
( zoology ) A class of polymorphous eusocial insects of a particular size and function within a colony .
